"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Ender Hoppers teleport items to itself, even through walls."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.ender_hoppers.1"}]}]

["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Ender Hoppers can pick up items in a range of 9x9 blocks, centered at itself and extending 3 blocks above itself."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.ender_hoppers.2"}]}]
